mapper.select: SELECT r.CounterClaimContext, f.FileName, f.FileUrl FROM react_use.case_replies r,react_use.files f,react_use.cases c,react_use.case_file_relations l WHERE r.CaseId = #{CaseId} and r.PlatformId = #{PlatformId} and r.DeleteFlag = 0 and c.PlatformId = 0 and c.DeleteFlag = 0 and l.CaseId = r.CaseId and l.RelationType = 1 and l.PlatformId = #{PlatformId} and l.RelatedId = r.id and l.DeleteFlag = 0 and f.id = l.fileId and f.PlatformId = #{PlatformId} and c.cid = '1000000011' order by f.LastModifiedDate asc;
